Package ohos.multimodalinput.event

Class StylusEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.multimodalinput.event.MultimodalEvent
      • ohos.multimodalinput.event.ManipulationEvent
        • ohos.multimodalinput.event.StylusEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sequenceable

    public abstract class StylusEvent
extends ManipulationEvent
    Reports stylus events.

    The reported event contains information such as button state change and stylus action (press, slide, or lift). Currently, one event supports only one stylus action.

    Since:
    5
    See Also:
    ManipulationEvent
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.MultimodalInput#MULTIMODAL_INPUT

      static int BUTTON_PRESS

      Indicates button state change in the stylus event.
      static int NONE
      Indicates that the stylus does not perform any operation on the screen.
      static int NONE_BUTTON
      Indicates no button state change in the stylus event.
      static int STYLUS_DOWN
      Indicates that the stylus presses on the screen.
      static int STYLUS_MOVE
      Indicates that the stylus slides on the screen.
      static int STYLUS_UP
      Indicates that the stylus lifts up from the screen.

    • Method Detail

      • getAction

        public abstract int getAction​()
        Obtains the stylus action.
        Returns:
        Returns the stylus action. The return value can be BUTTON_PRESS, BUTTON_RELEASE, STYLUS_DOWN, STYLUS_MOVE, or STYLUS_UP.
        Since:
        5

      • getButtons

        public abstract int getButtons​()
        Obtains the button state change of the stylus.
        Returns:
        Returns the button state change of the stylus. The return value can be FIRST_BUTTON or NONE_BUTTON.
        Since:
        5
